short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Tasks, beautiful backgrounds. Simply open a new tab and plan your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TINY TASKS
Tiny Tasks, beautiful backgrounds. Simply open a new tab to access your tasks and notes. 

TASKS
✓ Access your todos, every time you open a new tab
✓ Perfect for small todos at work
✓ Label important tasks

NOTES
✓ Temporary notes for phone calls and meetings

LINKS
✓ See your top 5 most visited websites as shortcuts 
✓ Open all links at once with one click 

IMAGES
✓ Choose from 60 beautiful, handpicked background pictures from all over the globe.
✓ Get a new amazing image every Sunday!
✓ Places such as Capetown, Berlin, Barcelona, Tel Aviv, Hong Kong and many more.

PAUSE UNTIL TOMORROW
✓ Sometimes we all need a pause from the best things in life :). Simply pause tiny tasks for the pause. 

SYNC
✓ Using multiple computers? No problem, your data is synced - without any login.
